sent.orig: I tire of walking, I tire of talking, and I tire of the laughable body.
sent.trans: 艾德温娜：我走也走累了，讲也讲累了，这可笑的身体也累了。

sent.orig: The tire blew; We blew a tire.
sent.trans: 轮胎爆了；我们已经爆了一个轮胎了。

sent.orig: Quick filling tool crow bar tire balance weights, scrapers, rolling real round, various tire wrench.
sent.trans: 如胎压枪、扩胎机、补胎机、胎压表、充气管、快充工具、轮胎撬棒、平衡锤、打磨机、滚压实轮、各种轮胎扳手。

sent.orig: While radial tire itself with the characteristics of the tubeless tire possible.
sent.trans: 同时子午线轮胎本身具有的特点使轮胎无内胎成为可能。

sent.orig: Using a cracked or damaged tire on the road can easily cause a tire blowout.
sent.trans: 使用已经有裂纹或损伤的轮胎行驶，容易引起爆胎。
